mapper.insert: insert into product (prd_code, prd_name, prd_subName, prd_etc, prd_description, prd_info, prd_price, prd_satisfaction, cnt_review) values (#{prd_code}, #{prd_name}, #{prd_subName}, #{prd_etc}, #{prd_description}, #{prd_info}, #{prd_price}, 0, 0)
insert into productFiles (fileNum, prd_code, fileName, oriName) values (PF_SEQ.nextval, #{prd_code}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
